comments.body: why did you do this change (streamed -> left, broadcast -> right)? this makes the variable name more confusing.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -29,22 +29,20 @@ import org.apache.spark.sql.execution.metric.SQLMetrics
  * for hash join.
  */
 case class LeftSemiJoinBNL(
-    streamed: SparkPlan, broadcast: SparkPlan, condition: Option[Expression])
+    left: SparkPlan, right: SparkPlan, condition: Option[Expression])
